name: chasm-cli
description: CLI tool for setting up Chasm Scout

scripts.build-binaries: bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-windows-x64-baseline ./src/cli.ts --outfile binaries/windows/cli-windows-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-x64-baseline ./src/cli.ts --outfile binaries/linux/cli-linux-x64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-linux-arm64 ./src/cli.ts --outfile binaries/linux/cli-linux-arm64  && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-arm64 ./src/cli.ts --outfile binaries/macos/cli-macos-arm64 && bun build --compile --minify --sourcemap --target=bun-darwin-x64 ./src/cli.ts --outfile binaries/macos/cli-macos-x64
